overview: Mariano returns to the elementary school where he studies after a long psychological therapy to treat his fears of the violence that exists in the city. Mariano will prove his courage when he face the bad boys of the school, a stage and surprise that they have prepared.

production_companies.name: Consejo Para la Cultura y las Artes de Nuevo Leon (Conarte)
Fondo de Promocion al Cine de Nuevo Leon (Promocine)

title: The Assembly
